title: Calling all creators: .channel is now available for registration
description: Google Registry, the domain registry behind some of the internet’s most popular (.app) and fun (.meme) new top-level domains, is launching .channel today.Designed specif…
author: Christina YehGoogle Registry Team
excerpt: Google Registry, the domain registry behind some of the internet’s most popular (.app) and fun (.meme) new top-level domains, is launching .channel today.Designed specifically for creators and publishers to build their online storefronts, sell digital and physical products and connect with their audiences, .channel is now available for anyone to register as part of our Early Access Program. Here’s what you need to know about registration:Early access period: February 4 - February 11, 2025. For an additional one-time fee, anyone can register their desired .channel domain. The one-time fee decreases according to a daily schedule through February 11.General availability: February 11, 2025 onwards. Starting on February 11, .channel domains will be publicly available at a base annual price through your registrar of choice.All phases begin and end at 16:00 UTC.To snag your .channel domain, visit get.channel today.

html:
Google Registry, the domain registry behind some of the internet’s most popular (.app) and fun (.meme) new top-level domains, is launching .channel today.

Designed specifically for creators and publishers to build their online storefronts, sell digital and physical products and connect with their audiences, .channel is now available for anyone to register as part of our Early Access Program. Here’s what you need to know about registration:

  • Early access period: February 4 - February 11, 2025. For an additional one-time fee, anyone can register their desired .channel domain. The one-time fee decreases according to a daily schedule through February 11.
  • General availability: February 11, 2025 onwards. Starting on February 11, .channel domains will be publicly available at a base annual price through your registrar of choice.
  • All phases begin and end at 16:00 UTC.

To snag your .channel domain, visit get.channel today.
